title: Daopay bugged?
body: Ok so I wanted to put 6$ to buy some skins from "Your Shop" and I decided to use dao pay. The first time I called them I got something like a message to put my Order Number but my phone automatically closed... Then I called again and it said that I had insufficient funds to make that call... (I didn't get the RP). I wanna ask something... Do I lose my cash if I don't put the Order Code? Thank you!

replies.body: Not totally familiar with this method of payment, but we should be able to help figure out what happened.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will be able to assist!
